front.title: Kiffex Operative
front.gametext: While at a Kiffex site: adds 1 to your Force drains there, is power +1 (or +2 if your spy is on Kiffex) and, once during each of your deploy phases, may deploy one site to Kiffex from Reserve Deck- reshuffle.
front.lore: Couriers. Watchful for any kind of activity by the Alliance or the Empire. Sell their information to anyone willing to buy.
